name: Match 3: Invasive Species
description:
Learn about how to identify and remove 8 different invasive species and apply them to a match 3 game where your ultimate goal is to empty the board. 

  • Be careful, as time goes on the remaining species tiles on the board will spread to adjacent empty spaces. 
  • As you make more matches, a power bar will fill up which will unlock a toolbox that can assist you if you pick the right tool. 
  • After dealing with a specific species correctly, you'll unlock an additional informational page about them.
